headline: Is McRib Advertising Litigation Reshaping Brand Trust In McDonald's (MCD)?
summary: McDonald’s is facing multiple federal class-action lawsuits in the US alleging that its McRib sandwich advertising misleads customers about containing real pork rib meat, claims the company firmly rejects while maintaining the product uses 100% seasoned boneless pork. This legal scrutiny raises questions about McDonald’s branding, product transparency, and how future marketing for limited-time menu items could be shaped by the outcomes. We’ll now examine how this wave of McRib-related...
